card.name: Aven Riftwatcher
card.property: Flying Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Aven Riftwatcher enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Benalish Commander
card.property: Benalish Commander's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Soldiers you control. Suspend X—{X}{W}{W}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{W}{W} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Benalish Commander while it's exiled, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

card.name: Crovax, Ascendant Hero
card.property: Other white creatures get +1/+1. Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1. Pay 2 life: Return Crovax, Ascendant Hero to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crovax was destined for an angel's curse, but one warped timeline saw the noble redeemed.

card.name: Dawn Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. • Regenerate target creature. • Counter target spell that targets you.

card.name: Dust Elemental
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying; fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Dust Elemental enters the battlefield, return three creatures you control to their owner's hand.

card.name: Ghost Tactician
card.property: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its ethereal hand confers a lifetime of experience with combat and steel.

card.name: Heroes Remembered
card.property: You gain 20 life. Suspend 10—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with ten time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Magus of the Tabernacle
card.property: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay {1}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Tabernacle's disciples channel the emanations from Pendrell Vale, spreading its paradoxical demand to be both worshipped and left alone.

card.name: Mantle of Leadership
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Pallid Mycoderm
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Pallid Mycoderm. Remove three spore counters from Pallid Mycoderm: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Sacrifice a Saproling: Each creature you control that's a Fungus or a Saproling gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Poultice Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{2}, {T}: Regenerate target Sliver."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its broad claw suggests a chitinous shield, but in fact it conceals glands that secrete a remarkably swift healing agent." —Rukarumel, field journal

card.name: Rebuff the Wicked
card.property: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I cannot teach you their brand of magic, but I can teach you how to defend against it." —Tavalus, priest of Korlis

card.name: Retether
card.property: Return each Aura card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Only creatures can be enchanted this way. (Aura cards that can't enchant a creature on the battlefield remain in your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rifts reach into infinite time streams, bringing the divergent products of alternate pasts into the present.

card.name: Riftmarked Knight
card.property: Protection from black; flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) Suspend 3—{1}{W}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) When the last time counter is removed from Riftmarked Knight while it's exiled, create a 2/2 black Knight creature token with flanking, protection from white, and haste.

card.name: Saltblast
card.property: Destroy target nonwhite permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dominaria erodes with each passing gust.

card.name: Saltfield Recluse
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He remembers a past of light and healing. But he lives the bitter present—parching salt, scouring wind, and the withering heat of the desert.

card.name: Serra's Boon
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 as long as it's white. Otherwise, it gets -2/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The light of an angel's glance is warm, but her fixed stare blinds and burns." —Calexis, deacon of the New Order of Serra

card.name: Shade of Trokair
card.property: {W}: Shade of Trokair gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Suspend 3—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Stonecloaker
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying When Stonecloaker enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand. When Stonecloaker enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Stormfront Riders
card.property: Flying When Stormfront Riders enters the battlefield, return two creatures you control to their owner's hand. Whenever Stormfront Riders or another creature is returned to your hand from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

card.name: Voidstone Gargoyle
card.property: Flying As Voidstone Gargoyle enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name. Spells with the chosen name can't be cast. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.

card.name: Whitemane Lion
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."

card.name: Calciderm
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Vanishing 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

card.name: Malach of the Dawn
card.property: Flying {W}{W}{W}: Regenerate Malach of the Dawn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sun rises, but the world still feels dark. Pray for the arrival of the malachim—they'll bring Dawn to the world and to our hearts." —Sister Betje, Miracles of the Saints

card.name: Mana Tithe
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who seek to upset the balance must be taxed for such ambitions." —Verithain, mesa high priest

card.name: Mesa Enchantress
card.property: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She shepherds mysteries and dust as others would a flock of sheep.

card.name: Mycologist
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Mycologist. Remove three spore counters from Mycologist: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Sacrifice a Saproling: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Porphyry Nodes
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy the creature with the least power. It can't be regenerated. If two or more creatures are tied for least power, you choose one of them. When there are no creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice Porphyry Nodes.

card.name: Revered Dead
card.property: {W}: Regenerate Revered Dead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mists coalesced into silent warriors. We charged them and broke through their lines, only to see them swirl and re-form behind us." —Golas Mahr, black knight

card.name: Sinew Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the muscle cords of the creature twitched, Hanna saw an unsettling unanimity in the others' rippling flesh. She didn't know what it meant, but she urged Sisay to keep the ship at a safe distance.

card.name: Sunlance
card.property: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's easy for the innocent to speak of justice. They seldom feel its terrible power." —Orim, Samite inquisitor

card.name: Aeon Chronicler
card.property: Aeon Chronicler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Suspend X—{X}{3}{U}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{3}{U} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Aeon Chronicler while it's exiled, draw a card.

card.name: Aquamorph Entity
card.property: As Aquamorph Entity enters the battlefield or is turned face up, it becomes your choice of 5/1 or 1/5. Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Auramancer's Guise
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it and has vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Consider not what the mask hides, but what it can reveal."

card.name: Body Double
card.property: You may have Body Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the dead outnumbered the living, mimics scavenged faces from the fallen.

card.name: Braids, Conjurer Adept
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put an artifact, creature, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rifted multiverse became a sea of conflicting realities, each peopled by possible versions of every living being.

card.name: Chronozoa
card.property: Flying Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Chronozoa dies, if it had no time counters on it, create two tokens that are copies of it.

card.name: Dichotomancy
card.property: For each tapped nonland permanent target opponent controls, search that player's library for a card with the same name as that permanent. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control, then that player shuffles their library. Suspend 3—{1}{U}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Dismal Failure
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Two magi could trade spells all day and never crown a victor. The real battle is not one of power but of will. If your confidence breaks, so too shall you." —Venser

card.name: Dreamscape Artist
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's mastered the art of sleight of land.

card.name: Erratic Mutation
card.property: Choose target creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. That creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. Put all cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Jodah's Avenger
card.property: {0}: Until end of turn, Jodah's Avenger gets -1/-1 and gains your choice of double strike, protection from red, vigilance, or shadow. (A creature with shadow can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

card.name: Magus of the Bazaar
card.property: {T}: Draw two cards, then discard three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some trade in goods, some in secrets. My soul has walked the futures, and I offer the rare coin of possibility."

card.name: Pongify
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Ape creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some spellcrafting mistakes go on to become spells of their own.

card.name: Reality Acid
card.property: Enchant permanent Vanishing 3 (This Aura enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Reality Acid leaves the battlefield, enchanted permanent's controller sacrifices it.

card.name: Shaper Parasite
card.property: Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Shaper Parasite is turned face up, target creature gets +2/-2 or -2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Spellshift
card.property: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal an instant or sorcery card. That player may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then the player shuffles their library.

card.name: Synchronous Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With a twitch of its muscles, its timeline forks. Then, just as quickly, its two selves reintegrate. Causality, strangely, seems not to mind." —Rukarumel, field journal

card.name: Tidewalker
card.property: Tidewalker enters the battlefield with a time counter on it for each Island you control. Vanishing (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from this creature. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) Tidewalker's power and toughness are each equal to the number of time counters on it.

card.name: Timebender
card.property: Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Timebender is turned face up, choose one — • Remove two time counters from target permanent or suspended card. • Put two time counters on target permanent with a time counter on it or suspended card.

card.name: Veiling Oddity
card.property: Suspend 4—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) When the last time counter is removed from Veiling Oddity while it's exiled, creatures can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Venarian Glimmer
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card with converted mana cost X or less from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dream of nothing, and wake to a dream come true.

card.name: Wistful Thinking
card.property: Target player draws two cards, then discards four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To probe the wonders of the multiverse, to gaze upon worlds unspoiled by blade or spell . . . it's enough to make one weep for the possibilities denied."

card.name: Frozen Aether
card.property: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gjornersen entertained his followers by taking bets on which would move first—the drowsing land wurm or the frozen goblins.

card.name: Gossamer Phantasm
card.property: Flying When Gossamer Phantasm becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Belief matters more than truth. Every moment, belief in imaginary things alters lives while truth sits unnoticed and waits." —Hakim, Loreweaver

card.name: Merfolk Thaumaturgist
card.property: {T}: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blasted fishtails! It's not enough that they meddle with my head, but they twist my body as well." —Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

card.name: Ovinize
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You wish for me to cow your enemies? I can do better than that . . . ." —Teferi, second-level student

card.name: Piracy Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Target creature gains islandwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) • Target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn. • Target player discards a card.

card.name: Primal Plasma
card.property: As Primal Plasma enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 creature, a 2/2 creature with flying, or a 1/6 creature with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tocasia brushed the gears and cogs from the table. There, before two wide-eyed brothers, she began a lesson on raw elemental magic.

card.name: Riptide Pilferer
card.property: Whenever Riptide Pilferer deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Serendib Sorcerer
card.property: {T}: Target creature other than Serendib Sorcerer has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even a dragon is humble as a kitten if it thinks itself a slave."

card.name: Serra Sphinx
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sphinxes drink from the mystic meres of Serra's realm, where their keen eyes watch reflections of what is and what is yet to come.

card.name: Big Game Hunter
card.property: When Big Game Hunter enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated. Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Blightspeaker
card.property: {T}: Target player loses 1 life. {4}, {T}: Search your library for a Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One croaked sermon spreads propaganda and plague.

card.name: Brain Gorgers
card.property: When you cast this spell, any player may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, counter Brain Gorgers. Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In spite of their hunger, they're slow eaters.

card.name: Circle of Affliction
card.property: As Circle of Affliction enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever a source of the chosen color deals damage to you, you may pay {1}. If you do, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Cradle to Grave
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the fell soil's appetite grows, it gulps down passersby upon their first footfall." —Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours

card.name: Dash Hopes
card.property: When you cast this spell, any player may pay 5 life. If a player does, counter Dash Hopes. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Focus an enemy's mind on what's already gone, and it's easier to take away more." —Holux, stronghold racketeer

card.name: Deadly Grub
card.property: Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Deadly Grub dies, if it had no time counters on it, create a 6/1 green Insect creature token with shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Enslave
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature deals 1 damage to its owner.

card.name: Extirpate
card.property: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) Choose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Imp's Mischief
card.property: Change the target of target spell with a single target. You lose life equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do the innocent pay for the crimes of the guilty? Of course they do. That's the fate of the weak." —Nicol Bolas

card.name: Magus of the Coffers
card.property: {2}, {T}: Add {B} for each Swamp you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All that remains of the Cabal are the echoes in its deepest vault. Yet those who hear the echoes feel a power undiminished by the dust of ages.

card.name: Midnight Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Midnight Charm deals 1 damage to target creature and you gain 1 life. • Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. • Tap target creature.

card.name: Mirri the Cursed
card.property: Flying, first strike, haste Whenever Mirri the Cursed deals combat damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Mirri the Cursed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hero fails, a martyr falls. Time twists and destinies interchange.

card.name: Muck Drubb
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Muck Drubb enters the battlefield, change the target of target spell that targets only a single creature to Muck Drubb. Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Phantasmagorian
card.property: When you cast this spell, any player may discard three cards. If a player does, counter Phantasmagorian. Discard three cards: Return Phantasmagorian from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ridged Kusite
card.property: {1} {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It offers but a taste of the power that the shadows have to offer. But even that is a heady wine indeed." —Ratadrabik of Urborg

card.name: Roiling Horror
card.property: Roiling Horror's power and toughness are each equal to your life total minus the life total of an opponent with the most life. Suspend X—{X}{B}{B}{B}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{B}{B}{B} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Roiling Horror while it's exiled, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Spitting Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our lances' reach had been our saving grace in our fight against the hive. Now even that advantage is taken from us." —Adom Capashen, Benalish knight

card.name: Temporal Extortion
card.property: When you cast this spell, any player may pay half their life, rounded up. If a player does, counter Temporal Extortion. Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The scythe of time or my blade at your throat—the choice is yours." —Holux, stronghold racketeer

card.name: Treacherous Urge
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may put a creature card from it onto the battlefield under your control. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Waning Wurm
card.property: Vanishing 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

card.name: Bog Serpent
card.property: Bog Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls a Swamp. When you control no Swamps, sacrifice Bog Serpent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thought it was a fallen tree trunk. Then it ate Snod." —Sneed, goblin barkwright

card.name: Damnation
card.property: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Dunerider Outlaw
card.property: Protection from green At the beginning of each end step, if Dunerider Outlaw dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tales of the outlaw's cruelty and might grew more embellished with each crime.

card.name: Kor Dirge
card.property: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rath's new evincar eliminated the brutish moggs and took a new slave race, one more reminiscent of her own feline grace.

card.name: Melancholy
card.property: Enchant creature When Melancholy enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Melancholy unless you pay {B}.

card.name: Null Profusion
card.property: Skip your draw step. Whenever you play a card, draw a card. Your maximum hand size is two.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some say that time is cyclical and that history inevitably repeats. My will is my own. I won't bow to fate." —Volrath

card.name: Rathi Trapper
card.property: {B}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tangling vines, fetid murk, paralyzing poisons, and crawling dead. The swamp is nature's trap waiting to be exploited by unnatural minds.

card.name: Shrouded Lore
card.property: Target opponent chooses a card in your graveyard. You may pay {B}. If you do, repeat this process except that opponent can't choose a card already chosen for Shrouded Lore. Then put the last chosen card into your hand.

card.name: Vampiric Link
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The familiar's fangs deliver the master's bite.

card.name: Aether Membrane
card.property: Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Aether Membrane blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat.

card.name: Akroma, Angel of Fury
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Flying, trample, protection from white and from blue {R}: Akroma, Angel of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Morph {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Battering Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Covered with hard shell-like plates, these slivers burrow through solid rock to carve out new nests for their hives.

card.name: Detritivore
card.property: Detritivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of nonbasic land cards in your opponents' graveyards. Suspend X—{X}{3}{R}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{3}{R} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Detritivore while it's exiled, destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Dust Corona
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and can't be blocked by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They infiltrated deep into the enemy camp under cover of darkness . . . and dirt." —Corus, viashino warrior

card.name: Fatal Frenzy
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains trample and gets +X/+0, where X is its power. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hope to have such a death—lying in triumph upon the broken bodies of those who slew me." —Radha, Keldon warlord

card.name: Firefright Mage
card.property: {1} {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature can't be blocked this turn except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After millennia of advancement in goblin military theory, Toggo VI realized that almost everyone is afraid of fire.

card.name: Fury Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn. • Remove two time counters from target permanent or suspended card.

card.name: Hammerheim Deadeye
card.property: Echo {5}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Hammerheim Deadeye enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with flying.

card.name: Keldon Marauders
card.property: Vanishing 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Keldon Marauders enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Lavacore Elemental
card.property: Vanishing 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a time counter on Lavacore Elemental.

card.name: Magus of the Arena
card.property: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature you control and target creature of an opponent's choice they control. Those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The magus still hears the roar of the crowds. They're gone, but the will to compete remains.

card.name: Needlepeak Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a testament to the forests' devastation that giant spiders now make their homes amid Dominaria's barren spires." —Aznaph, greenseeker

card.name: Shivan Meteor
card.property: Shivan Meteor deals 13 damage to target creature. Suspend 2—{1}{R}{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{R}{R} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Stingscourger
card.property: Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Stingscourger enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sulfur Elemental
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.) White creatures get +1/-1.

card.name: Timecrafting
card.property: Choose one — • Remove X time counters from target permanent or suspended card. • Put X time counters on target permanent with a time counter on it or suspended card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oddly, an unstable time stream makes wizards want to tinker with it even more.

card.name: Torchling
card.property: {R}: Untap Torchling. {R}: Target creature blocks Torchling this turn if able. {R}: Change the target of target spell that targets only Torchling. {1}: Torchling gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}: Torchling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Volcano Hellion
card.property: Volcano Hellion has echo {X}, where X is your life total. (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Volcano Hellion enters the battlefield, it deals an amount of damage of your choice to you and target creature. The damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Boom // Bust

alternate.name: Boom
alternate.property: Destroy target land you control and target land you don't control.

card.name: Dead // Gone

alternate.name: Dead
alternate.property: Dead deals 2 damage to target creature.

alternate.name: Gone
alternate.property: Return target creature you don't control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Rough // Tumble

alternate.name: Rough
alternate.property: Rough deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.

alternate.name: Tumble
alternate.property: Tumble deals 6 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Blood Knight
card.property: First strike, protection from white

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His is the fury of the wildfire, the boiling blood of the volcano. He fights you not because you've wronged him, but because you're there.

card.name: Brute Force
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blood, bone, and sinew are magnified, as is the rage that drives them. The brain, however, remains unchanged—a little bean, swinging by a strand in a cavernous, raving head.

card.name: Molten Firebird
card.property: Flying When Molten Firebird dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step and you skip your next draw step. {4}{R}: Exile Molten Firebird.

card.name: Prodigal Pyromancer
card.property: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Learn to burn!" —Institute of Arcane Studies motto

card.name: Pyrohemia
card.property: At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pyrohemia. {R}: Pyrohemia deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Reckless Wurm
card.property: Trample Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bred for battle in the Grand Coliseum, these wurms annihilated whole ecosystems when released into the wild.

card.name: Shivan Wumpus
card.property: Trample When Shivan Wumpus enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice a land. If a player does, put Shivan Wumpus on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easier to move the village than to divert the wumpus.

card.name: Simian Spirit Guide
card.property: Exile Simian Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All my spells smell like burnt hair lately." —Jaya Ballard, task mage

card.name: Skirk Shaman
card.property: Skirk Shaman can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a shaman's grimy hands, a concoction of dried Skirk Ridge herbs can become the face of panic.

card.name: Ana Battlemage
card.property: Kicker {2}{U} and/or {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} and/or {1}{B} as you cast this spell.) When Ana Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {2}{U} kicker, target player discards three cards. When Ana Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, tap target untapped creature and that creature deals damage equal to its power to its controller.

card.name: Citanul Woodreaders
card.property: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Citanul Woodreaders enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They seek out living trees to glean age-old secrets from sap and wood.

card.name: Deadwood Treefolk
card.property: Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Deadwood Treefolk enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Evolution Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Fungal Behemoth
card.property: Fungal Behemoth's power and toughness are each equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on creatures you control. Suspend X—{X}{G}{G}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{G}{G} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.) Whenever a time counter is removed from Fungal Behemoth while it's exiled, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Giant Dustwasp
card.property: Flying Suspend 4—{1}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{G} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

card.name: Hunting Wilds
card.property: Kicker {3}{G} (You may pay an additional {3}{G} as you cast this spell.) Search your library for up to two Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. If this spell was kicked, untap all Forests put onto the battlefield this way. They become 3/3 green creatures with haste that are still lands.

card.name: Jedit Ojanen of Efrava
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) Whenever Jedit Ojanen of Efrava attacks or blocks, create a 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature token with forestwalk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cat warriors recognized this Jedit's face, but not his fierce loyalty to Efrava.

card.name: Kavu Predator
card.property: Trample Whenever an opponent gains life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Kavu Predator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a withered world, the scent of healthy prey is enough to drive a predator to frenzy.

card.name: Life and Limb
card.property: All Forests and all Saprolings are 1/1 green Saproling creatures and Forest lands in addition to their other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was a sight of pain and awe—a twisted forest, migrating across the salt plain in search of richer soil." —Edahlis, greenseeker

card.name: Magus of the Library
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have exactly seven cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ancient books slowly crumbled, their secrets turning to dust. But their every word sings within the magus's head.

card.name: Mire Boa
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) {G}: Regenerate Mire Boa.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mire slime courses through its veins in place of blood. No sooner does it bleed than it opens its mouth to replace the loss.

card.name: Pouncing Wurm
card.property: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) If Pouncing Wurm was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it and with haste.

card.name: Psychotrope Thallid
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Psychotrope Thallid. Remove three spore counters from Psychotrope Thallid: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. {1}, Sacrifice a Saproling: Draw a card.

card.name: Reflex Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This sliver comes into the world a perfect predator. It's ready to hunt and devour its first meal within seconds of hatching." —Rukarumel, field journal

card.name: Sophic Centaur

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He endures the pain of remembering Krosa as it once was and hopes that a future generation will have need of his memories.

card.name: Timbermare
card.property: Haste Echo {5}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Timbermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only nature wreaks such lovely havoc.

card.name: Uktabi Drake
card.property: Flying, haste Echo {1}{G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

card.name: Utopia Vow
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. Enchanted creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll guard this fruit and its seedling until the land is healed. My life now belongs to Dominaria."

card.name: Vitaspore Thallid
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Vitaspore Thallid. Remove three spore counters from Vitaspore Thallid: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Sacrifice a Saproling: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Wild Pair
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, you may search your library for a creature card with the same total power and toughness and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Essence Warden
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The more our numbers grow, the more I gain hope that Volrath and his cursed stronghold will one day fall." —Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

card.name: Fa'adiyah Seer
card.property: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My visions don't show me home. They show me where home is yet to be found."

card.name: Gaea's Anthem
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To those who can hear it, Gaea's battle song brings power as swift as sunlight and as enduring as the deep roots of the forest." —Gamelen, Citanul elder

card.name: Groundbreaker
card.property: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Groundbreaker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The earth's memory is long, its retribution brief.

card.name: Harmonize
card.property: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing." —Seton, centaur druid

card.name: Healing Leaves
card.property: Choose one — • Target player gains 3 life. • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves of Llanowar don't trust in alchemy. They rely instead on pure herbs harvested from the forest's sacred heart.

card.name: Hedge Troll
card.property: Hedge Troll gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains. {W}: Regenerate Hedge Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His abode was clean and bare, not a morsel in sight. I asked him what he ate, fearing the answer. He smiled and said his faith alone sustained him.

card.name: Keen Sense
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crovax sensed that Mirri wasn't ready for the curse taking hold of her. Weeping in his heart, he fled.

card.name: Seal of Primordium
card.property: Sacrifice Seal of Primordium: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the simplifier, the root that drags all artifice to earth." —Seal inscription

card.name: Cautery Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{1}, Sacrifice this permanent: This permanent deals 1 damage to any target." All Slivers have "{1}, Sacrifice this permanent: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target player, planeswalker, or Sliver creature this turn."

card.name: Darkheart Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "Sacrifice this permanent: You gain 3 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At first we thought we were in some haunted wood. Then the branches twisted and scuttled toward us." —Merrik Aidar, Benalish patrol

card.name: Dormant Sliver
card.property: All Sliver creatures have defender. All Slivers have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It triggers the hive's period of Ætheric fertility—a time when even feeding is a lower priority than reproduction." —Rukarumel, field journal

card.name: Frenetic Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{0}: If this permanent is on the battlefield, flip a coin. If you win the flip, exile this permanent and return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If you lose the flip, sacrifice it."

card.name: Intet, the Dreamer
card.property: Flying Whenever Intet, the Dreamer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at that card for as long as it remains exiled. You may play that card without paying its mana cost for as long as Intet remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Necrotic Sliver
card.property: All Slivers have "{3}, Sacrifice this permanent: Destroy target permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though Volrath is long dead, the slivers have become everything he wanted them to be: mindless instruments of destruction and despair.

card.name: Numot, the Devastator
card.property: Flying Whenever Numot, the Devastator deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, destroy up to two target lands.

card.name: Oros, the Avenger
card.property: Flying Whenever Oros, the Avenger deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, Oros deals 3 damage to each nonwhite creature.

card.name: Radha, Heir to Keld
card.property: Whenever Radha, Heir to Keld attacks, you may add {R}{R}. {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Run home, cur. I've already taken your master's head. Don't make me thrash you with it."

card.name: Teneb, the Harvester
card.property: Flying Whenever Teneb, the Harvester deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Vorosh, the Hunter
card.property: Flying Whenever Vorosh, the Hunter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, put six +1/+1 counters on Vorosh.

card.name: Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth
card.property: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yawgmoth's corpse is a wound in the universe. His foul blood seeps out, infecting the land with his final curse." —Lord Windgrace
